title: How to Summon a Vehicle in Destiny 2

steps.title: Complete the campaign.
steps.content: Complete the campaign. Unlike in the original Destiny, Destiny 2 requires you to level up before you can ever get a vehicle of your own. Play the campaign until you reach complete it or reach level 20. [1] X Research source Even though you have to complete the game before you get your own sparrow, there are vehicles available on certain missions. To use one of these vehicles, simply walk up to it and press and hold " X " on Xbox One, or " Square " on PlayStation 4 to enter it.

steps.title: Talk to Amanda Holliday in the Tower.
steps.content: Talk to Amanda Holliday in the Tower. She's in the hanger. Take the corridor to the right to go to the Hanger after you arrive at the Tower. After completing the campaign, she will have free sparrows for you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select a sparrow.
steps.content: Select a sparrow. Pick one of the free sparrows Amanda Holliday has to offer you. She has three free sparrows for you to choose from. [3] X Research source You can also get vehicles through bright engrams. These can be earned or purchased after you hit level 20. Vehicles can be randomly discovered within engrams, making this a fairly less reliable method. Talk to Tess Everis at the farm to decrypt the bright engrams. You can also buy a vehicle from Tess Everis.

steps.title: Travel to an open level after acquiring your vehicle.
steps.content: Travel to an open level after acquiring your vehicle. You can summon a sparrow in any wide-open, outdoor area, such as Io, The Moon, Titan, etc.

steps.title: Open the character menu.
steps.content: Open the character menu. You can open the character menu by pressing " Menu " on Xbox One, " Options " on PlayStation 4, or " i " on PC.

steps.title: Press Down or S.
steps.content: Press Down or S . Press the Down button on the D-pad, or the " S " button on PC to view the vehicle menu of the character menu.

steps.title: Select the vehicle slot.
steps.content: Select the vehicle slot. It's the first slot on the left in the charcter's vehicle menu. This displays a list of vehicles you have.

steps.title: Equip your sparrow.
steps.content: Equip your sparrow. If you have more than one sparrow, select the one you want to use in the list of sparrows.

steps.title: Summon your Ghost.
steps.content: Summon your Ghost. After equipping your vehicle in the player menu, return to your game and summon your Ghost by pressing the " Touchpad " on PlayStation 4, the " Back/View " button on Xbox One, and " Tab " on PC. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Summon your vehicle.
steps.content: Summon your vehicle. Press and hold " X " on Xbox One, " Square " on PlayStation 4 and " R " on PC to summon your vehicle. Accelerate with the R2/RT/W, and decelerate with the L2/LT/S.
